mapper.update:
update sys_user
password=#{password},
status=#{status},
update_time=#{updateTime},
where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select c.* from sys_user a left join sys_user_role b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join sys_role c on b.role_id = c.role_id where a.user_name=#{userName}

select e.id,e.pid,e.menu_name as name from sys_user a left join sys_user_role b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join sys_role c on b.role_id = c.role_id left join sys_role_permission d on c.role_id=d.role_id left join sys_menu e on d.permission_id=e.id where a.user_id=#{userId}
